text:
What is everybody here doing for local development previewing? I was kind of stunned to find out that the HubSpot cli has no `preview` command now that the old HubSpot local development server is deprecated and several years old.

Any suggestions?

<@U25PYL3Q8> so after some back and forth with support, it seems a lot of people are having the same issues as I did. They're going to roll back the changes but it'll take 3 weeks, so if anyone has issues with the new cloning feature, it's best to ask support to re-gate your portal to the pre-update version
